title: SKBitmap.Decode returns null when decode PNG image.
body:
### Description

This is follow-up of https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/933 issue, which is closed as resolved, but the problem is still there 2.88.6 version of SkiaSharp. 

### Code

```
SkiaSharp.SKBitmap bmp = SkiaSharp.SKBitmap.Decode(@"C:\Temp\image1.png");
Assert.IsNotNull(bmp);
```

### Expected Behavior

_No response_

### Actual Behavior

_No response_

### Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.3 (Current)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.2 (Previous)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (Windows)

### Platform / Operating System

All
